piece.checkKing:
to checkKing [ :piece ] [
    make :dz objdz :piece
    if hasclass :dz "endzone [
        putclass "king :piece
        ifelse hasclass :piece "red [
            setobjimg :piece "redKing.png
  sethl :piece "redKingSelected.png      ] [
            setobjimg :piece "blackKing.png
  sethl :piece "blackKingSelected.png       ]
    ]
]

red.available:
to available [ :dz ] [
    make :moveset [ [ "UpRight ] [ "UpLeft ] ]
    make :ret pieceAvailable :dz :moveset
    return :ret
]

black.available:
to available [ :dz ] [
    make :moveset [ [ "DownRight ] [ "DownLeft ] ]
    make :ret pieceAvailable :dz :moveset
    return :ret
]

king.available:
to available [ :dz ] [
    make :moveset [ [ "DownRight ] [ "DownLeft ] [ "UpRight ] [ "UpLeft ] ]
    make :ret pieceAvailable :dz :moveset
    return :ret
]
